content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why Russia emerged as the leading supporter of the conservative political order established in 1815 ?

choices.label: Russian society had been less influenced by Enlightenment thought than were other European states.
The Russian monarchy had undertaken a program of modernization and Westernization under Tsar Peter the Great and his successors.
Russia had formed part of the coalition that defeated Napoleon.
Russia was the largest European state in terms of land area and population.

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
